result.title: Compile & run program in Sublime Text 3 on mac
result.content: Can anyone please explain what i need to do to compile and run a simple c++ program on mac using sublime text 3 ?? i tried ( Command + b ) for compile and ( command + shift + b ) for run but its not working.I am new in sublime text, so if you explain what i have to do step by step then it will be easy to understand for me. Thanks in advance :)
